item.title: Which EBS storage solution do I need?
item.description: Figuring out which EBS storage type to chooose can be a dautning task. Try out AgileSyndrome’s EBS Storage Solution test for a suggestion on what might work best for your next project! I would be glad to discuss your next storage needs in more detail too.
